revision.text:
Welcome to our To-Do list where we try and keep a track of everything which needs fixing/updating/adding/removing and anything else in any of the pages of the wiki. If you see something that needs to be done on any of the pages, feel free to edit this page and it in the below list or simply drop a message in our [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord] and someone else will do it.
We aim to one day have this page empty but it is not so easy unless everyone contributes a little.
Please do not delete the task if done, just write (DONE) before it so that one of the moderators can verify it. == Uncategorized Tasks == # '''PART''' Wandering Pokémon added to main berry page, consider adding uniquely attracted Pokémon to each berry infobox # Add a list of all the berries in each berries which need that berry for mutations. Such as list all berries that need Razz berry to mutate in the Razz berry page. # update Efficiency in underground page, until updated mention that this efficiency is no longer correct. # in [[Towns & Cities]] page, write which city is on what route preferably in a table format. # in [[Sprayduck]] page, the cost of lvling is not berries and should be changed to "harvested Plots". == Categorized Tasks == These task are also put together with like tasks so multiple tasks on one page can be done by 1 person all at once rather than multiple people over a long period of time because of misplaced information. ''Page Creation'' is the creation of an entire page, and then adding all the information, adding lots of images to pages, or just large undertakings of fairly blank pages. ''Finishing Touches'' is for pages that are missing a small bit of info, or need to have a few images uploaded to them. ''Updating'' is for pages that were afflicted by the most recent update of the game, and thus have to be checked for informational inaccuracies. ''Formatting'' is for pages that would need to have their infoboxes changes, the way the information is display, or the general aesthetic changed. === Page Creation === # '''PART''' Created [[Pokemon Day Care]] page, needs image of the Hatchery modal and revisions/additions to the text. # '''PART''' [[Shard Case]] page created, needs to be formatted in the same way and use the same templates as the other [[Key Items]]. See [[Wailmer Pail]] for reference # Add an Infobox to [[Shards]] displaying an image of the in game Shard Case # Add an Infobox to [[Pokemon Day Care]] displaying an image of the in game Hatchery # Add acquisition table to all [[Evolution Items]] (see [[Dragon Egg]] for reference) === Finishing Touches === === Updating === # Update [[Underground]] Images # Update [[Underground]] Efficiency Table === Formatting === == Dream tasks == These tasks are so long and such low priority that it is more of a dream to complete them. # '''PART''' [https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1l74KcfoY3Qs97RLJLwnpJYWcy2RzQ79e?usp=sharing|Berry Flow Charts] created for most berries. Need Kasib, Colbur, Apicot, Lansat, Starf, and Enigma ideas + diagrams # check every page that use PokeCoin.png and make the image appear after the amount. # add battle item type template for other pages in these headings, "Key items", "shop of each region" and any more that can be put under same big heading. # in each region's page, add a walkthrough-like flowchart (preferably in text format) showing what unlocks what as a player progress on map. {| role="presentation" class="wikitable mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" | example flow of kanto (version 0.7.3) |- | R1 -> r22, r2
R2-> viridian forest (for tutorial), then Pewter City
Pewter City -> R3-> Mt Moon -> R4 -> Cerulean City, R24
R24 -> R25
R25-> R5 (R5 opens hatchery) -> R6 -> Vermillion City, R11
Cerulean City -> R9 -> Rock Tunnel -> R10 ->Lavender Town, R8 ->R7 -> Celadon -> Saffron City, Pokemon Tower
Pokemon Tower -> R12, R16
R12 (get fishing rod) -> R 13 (Wailmer Pail) ->R14 -> R 15 - Fuschia City
R16 -> R17 -> R 18
R15 ALSO unlocks R18 and you can go the opposite way - R15->R18->R17
Fuschia City (Safari Ticket) -> POwer Plant, R21, R 19
R19 -> Seafoam Islands ->R 20 -> Pokemon Mansion -> Cinnabar Island Gym -> Viridian City Gym (Shard Case) ->R 23
R23 -> Victory Road -> Champions ->Cerulean Cave |- |New Bark Town -> R29 -> R46, R30 R30 -> R31 -> Sprout Tower -> Violet City Gym ->R32 -> Ruins of Alph, Union Cave Union Cave -> Slowpoke Well ->Azalea Gym ->Ilex Forest ->R 34 -> Goldenrod City, R35 R35 -> R36 -> R 37 -> Ecruteak City, Burned Tower, R38 R38 -> R39 -> Dock, R40 -> Cianwood City -> Olivine City Gym -> R47 -> R46 Ecruteak City ->R42 -> Mt Mortar, R43 Mt Mortar -> Mahogany Town -> R44 -> Tin Tower, Ice Path Ice Path -> Blackthorn City, R45 R45-> Dark Cave Blackthorn City ->R27->R26 -> Champion -> R28, Whirl Islands. (also all locked legendaries now unlocked) R28 Mt Silver |} Ditto face roaming Pokémon == Completed tasks awaiting moderators == # '''DONE''' in [[X Attack]] page, make the town names as links to [[Towns & Cities]] in Acquisition table. # '''DONE''' in [[Large Restore]] page, move the {{pdollar}} left of the amount and make the town names as links to [[Towns & Cities]] in Acquisition table. # '''DONE''' in [[Lucky Egg]] page, move the {{pdollar}} left of the amount and make the town names as links to [[Towns & Cities]] in Acquisition table. # '''DONE''' in [[Lucky Incense]] page, move the {{pdollar}} left of the amount and make the town names as links to [[Towns & Cities]] in Acquisition table. # '''DONE''' in [[Underground]] page, add a "Mine Layout" column under Items heading, see [[Fossils]] page for reference. # '''DONE''' in [[Item Magnet]] page, move the {{pdollar}} left of the amount and make the town names as links to [[Towns & Cities]] in Acquisition table # '''DONE''' Fix Wobbufett's uploaded image # '''DONE''' create a [[Key Items]] page listing all key items of the game. # '''DONE''' in [[Lum]], elaborate the "Strategy and important notes" section of the page. # '''DONE''' Update [[Baby Pokémon]] for Unova Pokémon # '''DONE''' Update [[Shards]] for Unova gyms # '''DONE''' Update [[Events]] for Santa Snorlax Event # '''DONE''' Add Unova roamers to [[Roaming Pokémon]] # '''DONE''' Add Unova egg pokemon to [[Egg]] # '''DONE''' Add Unova gyms to [[Gyms]] # '''DONE''' Add Unova NPCs to [[NPCs]] # '''DONE''' Add Unova shops to [[Shops]] # '''DONE''' Ensure all berry page infoboxes have a berrydex index in them # '''DONE''' Check and fix Egg Cycles, Attack Cycle, and Egg Steps for Gen 6, 7, and 8 pokémon in [[List of Pokemons with attack]] (Note: This is due to the latest breeding patch) # '''DONE''' Add alternate forms and event exclusive pokémon to [[List of Pokemons with attack]] # '''DONE''' Add Catch Rate column to all tables in [[List of Pokemons with attack]] # '''DONE''' [[Unova]] Page created # '''DONE''' Add Unova Towns and cities to [[Towns & Cities]] # '''DONE''' Update all region route lists for optimal shard farming as of version 7.0.0 # '''DONE''' Deleted the second [[Item Magnet]] to make it just say [[Item Magnet]] instead of Item Magnet Item Magnet in [[Battle Frontier]] page in the upgrades section # '''DONE''' Create all Unova dungeon pages # '''DONE''' in [[Babiri]] page, add the aura effect # '''DONE''' in [[Petaya]] page, add the aura effect that while this berry is ripe, it prevents all nearby berry from dying. # '''DONE''' in [[Events]] page, ad more details about what events are and what we look for in planning new events if someone wanna propose any idea # '''DONE''' Create [[Template:Infobox egg]] and add to all egg pages # '''DONE''' Create [[Template:Infobox evolution item]] and add to all evolution item pages # '''DONE''' Add Unova purchase locations to all item pages # '''DONE''' Add Unova routes to [[Route Statistics]] # '''DONE''' Add to [[Poke_Dollar|Pokedollar]] page, preferably detailed information like [[Dungeon Tokens]]. # '''DONE''' Add somewhere that egg steps in the Battle Frontier are the square root of the stage number # '''DONE''' Add Unova [[Protein]] efficiency table # '''DONE''' Add Unova to [[Dungeon Tokens]] # '''DONE''' add a growth table for each berry timings with maxed sprayduck or boost mulch equipped, they both give same boost so only one table will show time for both conditions (see example page [[Roseli]]) # '''DONE''' add a growth table for each berry timing with both maxed sprayduck and boost mulch active (see example page [[Roseli]]) # '''DONE''' Write how many total boost mulch each berry need to have the boost active with boost mulch alone (see example page [[Roseli]]) # '''DONE''' Write how many total boost mulch each berry need to have the boost active with both boost mulch & maxed sprayduck (see example page [[Roseli]]) # '''DONE''' add timing table for berries that need multiple berries to be ripe at the same time (see example page [[Roseli]]) # '''DONE''' make [[Berry Master]] page better, its too blank and raw right now. # '''DONE''' in [[Underground]] page, add a infobox on right showing the underground, update the efficiency section image with new underground image. # '''DONE''' Add the Cover and Plume Fossil underground tile images (in block format like the other fossils) to [[Fossils]] # '''DONE''' in [[Type and shard effectiveness]] page, the "practicality" section of the page need a clearer text explanation. # '''DONE''' Add images of pokemon before their names in these pages # '''DONE''' In underground page, add what pokemons drop Moon stones. # update Shops page to show new oak items {| role="presentation" class="wikitable mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" |List of pages that need pokemon images (Complete up to at least version 0.7.1) |- |'''[[Baby Pokémon]]''', '''[[Burned Tower]]''', '''[[Cave of Origin]]''', '''[[Cerulean Cave]]''', '''[[Dark Cave]]''', '''[[Dawn Stone]]''', '''[[Deepsea Scale]]''', '''[[Deepsea Tooth]]''', '''[[Digletts Cave]]''', '''[[Distortion World]]''', '''[[Dragon Egg]]''', '''[[Dragon Scale]]''', '''[[Dubious Disc]]''', '''[[Egg]]''', '''[[Electric Egg]]''', '''[[Eterna Forest]]''', '''[[Fiery Path]]''', '''[[Fighting Egg]]''', '''[[Fire Egg]]''', '''[[Fire Stone]]''', '''[[Flower Paradise]]''', '''[[Fossils]]''', '''[[Fullmoon Island]]''', '''[[Granite Cave]]''', '''[[Grass Egg]]''', '''[[Hall of Origin]]''', '''[[Hoenn]]''', '''[[Ice Path]]''', '''[[Ilex Forest]]''', '''[[Iron Island]]''', '''[[Jagged Pass]]''', '''[[Johto]]''', '''[[Kanto]]''', '''[[Kings Rock]]''', '''[[Lake Acuity]]''', '''[[Lake Valor]]''', '''[[Lake Verity]]''', '''[[Leaf Stone]]''', '''[[List of Pokemons with attack]]''', '''[[Magmarizer]]''', '''[[Metal Coat]]''', '''[[Moon Stone]]''', '''[[Mt. Pyre]]''', '''[[Mt Mortar]]''', '''[[Mt Silver]]''', '''[[New Mauville]]''', '''[[Newmoon Island]]''', '''[[Old Chateau]]''', '''[[Oreburgh Gate]]''', '''[[Petalburg Woods]]''', '''[[Pokemon Mansion]]''', '''[[Pokemon Tower]]''', '''[[Power Plant]]''', '''[[Prism Scale]]''', '''[[Protector]]''', '''[[Protein]]''', '''[[Ravaged Path]]''', '''[[Razor Claw]]''', '''[[Razor Fang]]''', '''[[Reaper Cloth]]''', '''[[Roaming Pokémon]]''', '''[[Rock Tunnel]]''', '''[[Ruins of Alph]]''', '''[[Rusturf Tunnel]]''', '''[[Safari Zone]]''', '''[[Seafloor Cavern]]''', '''[[Seafoam Islands]]''', '''[[Sealed Chamber]]''', '''[[Shiny Stone]]''', '''[[Shoal Cave]]''', '''[[Shops]]''', '''[[Sinnoh]]''', '''[[Sky Pillar]]''', '''[[Slowpoke Well]]''', '''[[Snowpoint Temple]]''', '''[[Soothe Bell]]''', '''[[Spear Pillar]]''', '''[[Sprout Tower]]''', '''[[Stark Mountain]]''', '''[[Sun Stone]]''', '''[[Thunder Stone]]''', '''[[Tin Tower]]''', '''[[Trade Stone]]''', '''[[Union Cave]]''', '''[[Upgrade]]''', '''[[Unova]]''', '''[[Victory Road]]''', '''[[Victory Road Hoenn]]''', '''[[Victory Road Sinnoh]]''', '''[[Viridian Forest]]''', '''[[Water Egg]]''', '''[[Water Stone]]''', '''[[Wayward Cave]]''', '''[[Whirl Islands]]''', '''[[Weather]]''' |}

Cerulean City -> R9 -> Rock Tunnel -> R10 ->Lavender Town, R8 ->R7 -> Celadon -> Saffron City, Pokemon Tower
Pokemon Tower -> R12, R16
R12 (get fishing rod) -> R 13 (Wailmer Pail) ->R14 -> R 15 - Fuschia City
R16 -> R17 -> R 18
R15 ALSO unlocks R18 and you can go the opposite way - R15->R18->R17
Fuschia City (Safari Ticket) -> POwer Plant, R21, R 19
R19 -> Seafoam Islands ->R 20 -> Pokemon Mansion -> Cinnabar Island Gym -> Viridian City Gym (Shard Case) ->R 23

''Finishing Touches'' is for pages that are missing a small bit of info, or need to have a few images uploaded to them. ''Updating'' is for pages that were afflicted by the most recent update of the game, and thus have to be checked for informational inaccuracies. Welcome to our To-Do list where we try and keep a track of everything which needs fixing/updating/adding/removing and anything else in any of the pages of the wiki. If you see something that needs to be done on any of the pages, feel free to edit this page and it in the below list or simply drop a message in our [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord] and someone else will do it.
We aim to one day have this page empty but it is not so easy unless everyone contributes a little.
Please do not delete the task if done, just write (DONE) before it so that one of the moderators can verify it. == Uncategorized Tasks == # '''PART''' Wandering Pokémon added to main berry page, consider adding uniquely attracted Pokémon to each berry infobox # Add a list of all the berries in each berries which need that berry for mutations. Such as list all berries that need Razz berry to mutate in the Razz berry page. # update Efficiency in underground page, until updated mention that this efficiency is no longer correct. # update Shops page to show new oak items # in [[Towns & Cities]] page, write which city is on what route preferably in a table format. == Categorized Tasks == These task are also put together with like tasks so multiple tasks on one page can be done by 1 person all at once rather than multiple people over a long period of time because of misplaced information. ''Page Creation'' is the creation of an entire page, and then adding all the information, adding lots of images to pages, or just large undertakings of fairly blank pages. ''Finishing Touches'' is for pages that are missing a small bit of info, or need to have a few images uploaded to them. ''Updating'' is for pages that were afflicted by the most recent update of the game, and thus have to be checked for informational inaccuracies. ''Formatting'' is for pages that would need to have their infoboxes changes, the way the information is display, or the general aesthetic changed. === Page Creation === # '''PART''' Created [[Pokemon Day Care]] page, needs image of the Hatchery modal and revisions/additions to the text. # '''PART''' [[Shard Case]] page created, needs to be formatted in the same way and use the same templates as the other [[Key Items]]. Please do not delete the task if done, just write (DONE) before it so that one of the moderators can verify it. == Uncategorized Tasks == # '''PART''' Wandering Pokémon added to main berry page, consider adding uniquely attracted Pokémon to each berry infobox # Add a list of all the berries in each berries which need that berry for mutations. Such as list all berries that need Razz berry to mutate in the Razz berry page. # In underground page, add what pokemons drop Moon stones. # update Efficiency in underground page, until updated mention that this efficiency is no longer correct. # update Shops page to show new oak items # in [[Towns & Cities]] page, write which city is on what route preferably in a table format. == Categorized Tasks == These task are also put together with like tasks so multiple tasks on one page can be done by 1 person all at once rather than multiple people over a long period of time because of misplaced information. ''Page Creation'' is the creation of an entire page, and then adding all the information, adding lots of images to pages, or just large undertakings of fairly blank pages. ''Finishing Touches'' is for pages that are missing a small bit of info, or need to have a few images uploaded to them. ''Updating'' is for pages that were afflicted by the most recent update of the game, and thus have to be checked for informational inaccuracies. ''Formatting'' is for pages that would need to have their infoboxes changes, the way the information is display, or the general aesthetic changed. === Page Creation === # '''PART''' Created [[Pokemon Day Care]] page, needs image of the Hatchery modal and revisions/additions to the text. # '''PART''' [[Shard Case]] page created, needs to be formatted in the same way and use the same templates as the other [[Key Items]]. Need Kasib, Colbur, Apicot, Lansat, Starf, and Enigma ideas + diagrams # check every page that use PokeCoin.png and make the image appear after the amount. # add battle item type template for other pages in these headings, "Key items", "shop of each region" and any more that can be put under same big heading. # Upload all pokemon images non-shiny and shiny version.
